attributes.action: Free Electricity & Gas and Heating oil for OAPs
attributes.additional_details:
Is it not time we look after our OAPs in this country
Its time the big suppliers in the UK offered utilities for free
How many more OAPs will die this winter due to the fact they can’t afford to heat their homes why should they have to choose heating over food
Don’t they deserve a better standard of living than they do at present it’s a fact we will all grow old one day and would you like to be living like some of our OAPs are today

This could be done on a means tested scale so those in more need get more help
Its time for change its time the suppliers started giving something back to those how really need help
When you think just how much profit they are making would they even miss the tiny amount we are talking about they have a social responsibility to look after those who have kept them in profit the longest
Thank you for taking time to read this please show your support
